name: JSON Crack
title: jsoncrack.com
shortDescription: JSON Crack is an open-source online tool designed to help users visualize and understand complex JSON data through interactive graphs. Users can upload JSON files, input data via URL, or type directly into a text editor. The tool automatically converts data into a visual tree graph, allowing for quick comprehension and easy exploration. It supports multiple formats like YAML, CSV, XML, and TOML, catering to developers, data scientists, and anyone dealing with data. Example use case: A developer can convert JSON to CSV for easier data manipulation and sharing.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Altair GraphQL Client
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Visual tool for GraphQL, not JSON
